description: Indulge in our seasonal donut offerings! With a rotating selection of irresistible treats, including returning favorites and exciting new flavors, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Donut miss out on these limited-time sweet treats!

featuredItems.name: Fall Favorites Dozen
featuredItems.description: A dozen of our favorite fall donuts, including Pumpkin Spice and Apple Cider
featuredItems.ingredients: Pumpkin, cinnamon, apple cider, cinnamon sugar

featuredItems.name: Bourbon Caramel Apple Pie Milkshake
featuredItems.description: A dozen of our favorite fall donuts, including Pumpkin Spice and Apple Cider

featuredItems.name: Fall Favorites Half Dozen
featuredItems.description: A dozen of our favorite fall donuts, including Pumpkin Spice and Apple Cider
featuredItems.ingredients: Pumpkin, cinnamon, apple cider, cinnamon sugar

featuredItems.name: Pumpkin Macchiato
featuredItems.description: Crisp leaves in the air, Pumpkin Macchiatos in hand - Fall is officially here. Our Pumpkin Macchiato can be order hot or iced and is perfectly spiced, oh so nice!

description: Not sure what combination you are looking to try? Customers of Duck Donuts came up with their favorite donut combination. Choose a fan favorite or one of our other duckzillion combinations!

items.name: Bacon in the Sun
items.description: Enjoy the flavors of maple icing topped with chopped bacon and salted caramel drizzle.
items.ingredients: Maple Icing, Chopped Bacon, Salted Caramel Drizzle

items.name: Beach Ball
items.description: Can't decide between sprinkles and a chocolate drizzle - get both! Unlock your inner child and get the works on this donut with vanilla icing, rainbow sprinkles, and chocolate drizzle.
items.ingredients: Vanilla Icing, Rainbow Sprinkles, Chocolate Drizzle

items.name: Blueberry Lemonade
items.description: Sweet, tangy, and totally satisfying, this summer feature will remind you of a blueberry lemonade–only better!
items.ingredients: Blueberry Icing, Lemon Drizzle

items.name: Blueberry Pancake
items.description: Two breakfast favorites are combined to make one incredible donut! This July featured donut has blueberry icing with a drizzling of maple syrup.
items.ingredients: Blueberry Icing, Maple Drizzle, Powdered Sugar

items.name: Chocolate Caramel Crunch
items.description: Go nuts over this salty, sweet, and crunchy donut! Enjoy this donut covered in chocolate icing, peanuts, and salted caramel drizzle.
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, Peanuts, Salted Caramel Drizzle

items.name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry
items.description: Enjoy the sweet flavor of strawberry icing finished with chocolate drizzle.
items.ingredients: Strawberry Icing, Chocolate Drizzle

items.name: Chocolate Explosion
items.description: What could be better than chocolate, chocolate and more chocolate! It's a chocolate lover's dream!
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, OREO® Crumbles, Hot Fudge Drizzle

items.name: Cinnamon Bun
items.description: Love cinnamon buns? Then you'll love this sweet donut with cinnamon sugar and vanilla icing. Get enough for everyone - this donuts too good to share!
items.ingredients: Cinnamon Sugar, Vanilla Drizzle

items.name: Coconut Island Bliss
items.description: Chocolate and peanuts is a classic combo—now add coconut for a new twist on this time-honored taste.
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, Peanuts, Coconut

items.name: Cookies & Cream
items.description: That’s just the way the cookie crumbles! Indulge your sweet tooth with vanilla icing, OREO® Cookie pieces, and hot fudge drizzle.
items.ingredients: Vanilla Icing, OREO® Cookie Pieces, Hot Fudge Drizzle

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Tastes just like French toast! Maple icing topped with powdered and cinnamon sugars.
items.ingredients: Maple Icing, Powdered Sugar, Cinnamon Sugar

items.name: Maple Bacon
items.description: This savory and sweet tribute to everyone's favorite breakfast food is a real fan favorite. This daring donut has maple icing with pieces of bacon on top.
items.ingredients: Maple Icing, Chopped Bacon

items.name: Midnight Madness
items.description: Chocolate icing with chocolate sprinkles is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth.
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, Chocolate Sprinkles

items.name: Peanut Butter & Jelly
items.description: The Duck Donuts homage to the peanut butter and jelly sandwich! Our creamy peanut butter icing and decadent raspberry drizzle are sure to satisfy.
items.ingredients: Peanut Butter Icing, Raspberry Drizzle

items.name: Peanut Butter Paradise
items.description: Treat yourself to this donut with peanut butter icing and chocolate drizzle. These two crowd-pleasing flavors combine to make the donut dream team!
items.ingredients: Peanut Butter Icing, Chocolate Drizzle

items.name: Pina Colada
items.description: Fresh, fruity flavors top this donut featuring lemon icing and shredded coconut.
items.ingredients: Lemon Icing, Shredded Coconut

items.name: Raspberry Fluff
items.description: This ooey-gooey combination features a delicious drizzle of raspberry and marshmallow on top of our classic vanilla icing.
items.ingredients: Vanilla Icing, Raspberry Drizzle, Marshmallow Drizzle

items.name: Sand Dollar
items.description: Creamy vanilla coated in coconut! This is a featured donut for those who like a tropical twist on their classic treats.
items.ingredients: Vanilla Icing, Shredded Coconut, Powdered Sugar

items.name: S'mores
items.description: It's like donuts at the campfire! Enjoy chocolate icing with graham cracker crumbs & marshmallow drizzle.
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, Graham Cracker Crumbs, Marshmallow Drizzle

items.name: Strawberry Confetti
items.description: One of our most colorful donuts, the combo of strawberry icing and rainbow sprinkles is sure to put a smile on your face!
items.ingredients: Strawberry Icing, Rainbow Sprinkles

items.name: Strawberry Shortcake
items.description: This cheerful combination includes strawberry icing, graham cracker crumbs, and a sweet vanilla drizzle.
items.ingredients: Strawberry Icing, Graham Cracker Crumbs, Vanilla Drizzle

items.name: Sunrise
items.description: Brighten up your day with this fun, fruity delight! Try this donut with lemon icing and raspberry drizzle today.
items.ingredients: Lemon Icing, Raspberry Drizzle

items.name: The Beach
items.description: Rich vanilla poured over a generous dusting of blissful cinnamon sugar. This classic, homemade flavor is sure to satisfy.
items.ingredients: Vanilla Icing, Cinnamon Sugar

items.name: The Boardwalk
items.description: Indulge your sweet tooth with glazed icing, OREO® Cookie Pieces, powdered sugar, and vanilla drizzle.
items.ingredients: Classic Glaze, OREO® Cookie Pieces, Powdered Sugar, Vanilla Drizzle

items.name: The Flip Flop
items.description: Simple elegance and a big flavor to match. Pairing chocolate and vanilla on a fresh donut is a recipe for a sure-fire classic.
items.ingredients: Chocolate Icing, Vanilla Drizzle

description: Make every day great with a dozen of our Fan Favorites, creative combinations and warm, delicious donuts that are made to order!

items.name: Breakfast Box
items.description: All of your breakfast favorites in one box. Perfect for “breakfast in bed” and “breakfast for dinner” too!

ingredients.name: French Toast
ingredients.description: Maple Icing with Cinnamon Sugar & Powdered Sugar

ingredients.name: Blueberry Pancake
ingredients.description: Blueberry Icing with Maple Drizzle & Powdered Sugar

items.name: Duck Dozen
items.description: Indulge in a dozen filled with creative combinations inspired by our hometown of Duck, NC! This one is sure to light up those tastebuds!

items.name: Signature Assortment
items.description: A donut filled with vanilla cream and topped with chocolate glaze

items.name: Party Box
items.description: A donut filled with vanilla cream and topped with chocolate glaze

description: Get your favorite breakfast combinations on a donut. Our Donut Breakfast Sandwich starts with a warm, delicious sliced donut. Make it your own with your choice of protein: egg, cheese, sausage or bacon, and don't forget to top it with maple drizzle and chopped bacon!

items.name: Maple Drizzle, Chopped Bacon, Sausage, Egg & Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Get the works with this flavorful breakfast sandwich with egg, sausage, and cheese on a donut topped with maple icing and chopped bacon.

items.name: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Everybody loves bacon and donuts - paired with egg and cheese, they make one delicious breakfast sandwich!

items.name: Sausage, Egg, and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Escape your breakfast rut and thrill your taste buds with our sausage, egg, and cheese breakfast sandwich.

items.name: Egg & Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Enjoy an every day classic with a twist!

featuredItems.name: Pumpkin Macchiato
featuredItems.description: Crisp leaves in the air, Pumpkin Macchiatos in hand - Fall is officially here. Our Pumpkin Macchiato can be order hot or iced and is perfectly spiced, oh so nice!

items.name: Cold Brew Coffee
items.description: A tailor-roasted blend, slow-steeped in cold water for 12-16 hours, without touching heat, and poured over ice to order.

items.name: Americano
items.description: Freshly brewed espresso shots combined with water, available hot or iced.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Freshly brewed espresso topped with a milk foam handcrafted by frothing the milk. Cappuccinos are only served hot.

items.name: Lattes
items.description: Available with custom flavors such as caramel and vanilla, a hot latte is freshly brewed espresso and steamed milk with a thin layer of foam on the top and an iced latte is freshly brewed espresso, cold milk, and ice.

items.name: Caramel Macchiatos
items.description: Available hot or iced, a caramel macchiato is freshly brewed espresso poured over milk and flavored with vanilla and drizzled with caramel.

items.name: Mochas
items.description: Available hot or iced, a mocha is freshly brewed espresso poured over milk and flavored with either white or dark chocolate.

items.name: Espresso
items.description: Freshly brewed double shot of espresso available hot or iced.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Handcrafted fresh to order with steamed milk, dark chocolate, and vanilla. Topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Coffee Frappe
items.description: A frozen coffee beverage blended with milk and ice.

items.name: Mocha Frappe
items.description: A frozen coffee beverage blended with chocolate.

items.name: Caramel Frappe
items.description: A frozen coffee beverage blended with sweet caramel sauce.

featuredItems.name: Bourbon Caramel Apple Pie Milkshake
featuredItems.description: We combined the best fall flavors into one irresistibly indulgent milkshake. Try a Bourbon Caramel Apple Pie milkshake today!

items.name: Classic Donut Sundae
items.description: Peanuts, sprinkles, and fudge piled high atop a warm, freshly made donut. Yes, it is as good as it looks.

items.name: Salted Caramel Donut Sundae
items.description: Salty + Sweet = Pure Perfection! A warm cinnamon sugar donut topped with vanilla ice cream and salted caramel drizzle.

items.name: S'mores Donut Sundae
items.description: We're taking S'mores to a whole new level! A warm, vanilla cake donut coated with chocolate icing and topped with ice cream, marshmallow drizzle, hot fudge and graham cracker crumbs!

items.name: Cookies & Cream Sundae
items.description: One of our best sellers, this donut sundae starts with a warm, vanilla cake donut coated with vanilla icing and topped with vanilla ice cream, hot fudge and of course, OREO® Cookies Pieces!

items.name: Chocolate Madness Sundae
items.description: Calling all chocolate lovers! A warm, vanilla cake donut topped coated in chocolate icing, topped with vanilla ice cream and topped with all MORE chocolate - hot fudge, OREO(R) Cookie Crumbles and chocolate sprinkles!

items.name: Confetti Sundae
items.description: What better way to celebrate than with donuts, ice cream and sprinkles! A warm, vanilla cake donut coated with vanilla icing and topped with vanilla ice cream, raspberry drizzle and rainbow sprinkles!

items.name: Peanut Butter Crunch Sundae
items.description: Perfect for peanut butter lovers! A warm, vanilla cake donut coated with peanut butter icing, topped with vanilla ice cream and peanuts, and drizzled with marshmallow.

items.name: Strawberry Shortcake Sundae
items.description: A twist on a classic, this sundae starts with a warm, vanilla cake donut coated with strawberry icing, is topped with vanilla ice cream, and finished with graham cracker crumbs!

items.name: Birthday Cake Milkshake
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended with white chocolate and cupcake flavors and topped with whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles!

items.name: Blueberry Milkshake
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended with bits of blueberry and topped with whipped cream!Vanilla ice cream blended with bits of blueberry and topped with whipped cream!

items.name: Chocolate Milkshake
items.description: A classic hand-dipped chocolate shake topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle!

items.name: Cookies & Cream Milkshake
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended with OREO® Cookie pieces and topped with whipped cream!

items.name: Maple Bacon Milkshake
items.description: A twist on our fan favorite Maple Bacon donut, this hand-dipped milkshake boasts all the flavors you would expect - vanilla ice cream, maple and bacon!

items.name: Salted Caramel Milkshake
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended and drizzled with salted caramel!

items.name: S'mores Milkshake
items.description: A twist on our fan favore S'mores donut, this milkshake blends vanilla ice cream with dark chocolate sauce, toasted marshmallow and topped whipped cream, chocolate and graham cracker!

items.name: Strawberry Milkshake
items.description: Vanilla ice cream blended with bits of strawberry and topped with whipped cream!

items.name: Vanilla Milkshake
items.description: Hand-dipped vanilla ice cream topped with whipped cream!

items.name: Original Lemonade
items.description: Enjoy a taste of sunshine all year long with our old-fashioned original lemonade.

items.name: Strawberry Lemonade
items.description: Squeeze the day with our strawberry lemonade, made with our old-fashioned lemonade and strawberry fruit bits.

items.name: Raspberry Dragonfruit Lemonade Refresher
items.description: Get a gentle boost from our Raspberry Dragonfruit Lemonade Refresher that’s infused with natural energy.
items.ingredients: Each fl. oz. of Maui® Refresher contains 60mg of caffeine from green coffee extract and whole coffee fruit extract.

items.name: Citrus Mango Pineapple Lemonade Refresher
items.description: Bursting with flavor and infused with natural energy, our Citrus Mango Pineapple Lemonade Refresher is sure to quench your thirst!
items.ingredients: Each fl. oz. of Maui® Refresher contains 60mg of caffeine from green coffee extract and whole coffee fruit extract.

items.name: Blueberry Popping Bubbles
items.description: Want to add a fun twist to your Lemonade or Lemonade Refresher? Add a scoop of our new Blueberry Popping Bubbles! These delightfully flavorful orbs add a playful twist to any drink.
